div.p: Group 1 Mapping from Code Search Supportversion: 5.0.0) to Code Search Supportversion: 5.0.0)

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for ValueSet ValueSet-R5-code-search-support-for-R4 from FHIR R5 to FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of concepts from ValueSet `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/code-search-support|5.0.0` for use in FHIR R4.
